name: DiceQuest
description:
DiceQuest For a better experience play in fullscreen!

DiceQuest is a unique turn on the rpg-roguelike style, with the main character being a dice. This was made for the gmtk 2022 game jam and the theme is 'The roll of a dice'. This game interprets that litterally as the only way to move is to roll like a dice.

Kill enemies by ramming yourself into them, and pickup keys to open doors!

Credits:
